bugzilla core 2.0.0.v20070514-1800

When trying to reassign a task, our bugzilla instance gave an error page due to some localization issues (which have been resolved).
However, the task view reported 'Unable to submit task at this time, try again later' or similar.

In the error log the following appeared:

java.io.IOException: Mark invalid
	at java.io.BufferedReader.reset(BufferedReader.java:485)
	at org.eclipse.mylar.internal.bugzilla.core.BugzillaClient.postTaskData(BugzillaClient.java:744)
	at org.eclipse.mylar.internal.bugzilla.core.BugzillaTaskDataHandler.postTaskData(BugzillaTaskDataHandler.java:108)
	at org.eclipse.mylar.tasks.ui.editors.AbstractRepositoryTaskEditor$32.run(AbstractRepositoryTaskEditor.java:2709)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.jobs.Worker.run(Worker.java:55)
